features: *BLUETOOTH CEILING SPEAKERS:The in Wall Amplifier Receiver allows you to stream music to a connected intercom or speaker system hassle free. Compatible with all of today's latest smart devices(iPhones, iPads, iOS & Androids smartphones tablets, PC, Laptops, Desktops, etc.) and a wireless range of 30+ feet.

*EASY TO INSTALL: Install this home audio system on any wall in the home or office .The wall mount amplifier has a universal standard wall plate size .Connected with our HCS-818 ceiling speakers and let it give you versatile sound experience that is easily accessible.

*MIC IN /USB /AUX-IN: It features USB flash memory reader for media playback which also doubles as charging port for your devices. AUX 3.5mm audio input jack lets you connect and stream audio from external devices, The Wall plate receiver adds convenient microphone paging ability along with sample source audio control.

*IN CEILING SPEAKERS FEATURES: 320WATTS MAX POWER，HCS-818 Ceiling speaker were carefully combined to reproduce sound clearly with outstanding responsiveness. The polypropylene cone with rubber edge will help extending the life of the product perfect for custom audio applications.

*WHAT IS IN THE BOX & DIMENSION: 1x in Wall Bluetooth Amplifier, 1X AC Adapter, 2X Screws, 2X in Ceiling Speakers, 2X Speaker Wire,2X User Manual. Total Speakers Diameter: 9.25 Inches (23.5 CM), Cut Out Diameter: 8.07 Inches(20.5 CM), Mounting Depth: 4.92 Inches (12.5 CM).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The HCS818 is a 2-way in-wall speaker with a high excursion 6.5 inch poly woofer and a 1 inch soft dome tweeter. This combination provides the utmost flexibility in terms of configuration and suitability to different types of audio tastes.The HCS818 is built with carefully selected components and rigorous design to deliver exceptional value and performance.320 watt high fidelity speaker with independent tweeter and woofer, the sound quality is clear and the levels are distinct.Simple to install and paintable to match existing wall color, the HCS818 is an ideal way to add high quality sound to a room without taking up any additional space.

Poly-Mica Woofer In addition to smooth and natural vocals, the 6.5 inch woofer is capable of robust bass output, allowing the HCS818 to be used without the need for a subwoofer in many applications. Pivoting Silk Dome Tweeter The 1-inch silk dome tweeter generates abundant detail and clarity, projecting a solid and focused image for all sources. Pivoting design means the tweeter can be aimed for a spacious sound stage. Advanced Crossover Design Perfect integration between the tweeter and woofer is achieved through a 6dB crossover network that ensures coherent transition in the critical upper midrange region. Easy Installation Simple knob design makes the installation firmer.The ceiling speaker can match existing flush mounted designs in your home or workplace and achieve wide-range sound performance.

Technical Specs: Power Output:100 Watt Peak,40 Watt RMS X 2Ch.@4Ohm Advanced Technology Compatible with Bluetooth: 5.0 Mic Input Type:Dymanic Power Amp Type:Class-D Minimum Load Resistance:4 Ohm T.H.D.:0.03%(8 Ohm,1KHZ) Power Draw:12V 3Amps Power:DC 100-240V,50/60Hz(12V DC Adapter) Wall Mount 2 channel wall amplifier Herdio Inwall Wireless Audio Control has a universal standard wall plate size and fits on most US electrical gang boxes. Connect speakers / additional external devices and let it give you versatile sound experience that is easily accessible. In-Wall, Wall Plate Audio/Music Control Universal Standard Wall Plate Size Full Range Audio & Stereo Sound Transmission Connect & Stream Audio from External Devices Perfect for the Home, Office and Business

Advanced 5.0 Technology Compatible with Bluetooth Enjoy wireless music streaming thanks to built-in technology compatible with bluetooth. Works with all of your favorite Smart devices (like iPhones, Androids, Smartphones, iPads, Tablets, and more). Instantly stream your favorite tracks and internet radio services like Pandora or Spotify. It's easy to setup and control! Gain access to your music library and play exactly what you want to hear. USB Port for Device Charging The audio controller features a USB flash memory reader for media playback which also doubles as a charging port for your devices. Also features AUX 3.5mm audio input jack, lets you connect and stream audio from external devices Microphone Paging and Speaker Control Take control of your audio system. With this easy to use in-wall plate amplifier you can control the volume of your sound as well as have multiple inputs that connect to your stereo system/speakers. Microphone paging is also easy to do. Perfect for making announcements or paging someone in the office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great in our 10'×12' office
reviews.reviewText: Work and sound great in our small home office.Had a good shopping experience with the seller. Had a problem with the 1st pair I purchased but that was rectified by the seller quickly when they sent out a replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product and value for money
reviews.reviewText: Excellent was easy to install for the fact I installed them on my T&G ceiling. Had to buy sturdy speaker wire Amazon brand. Needed longer wires for fishing through. Overall very impressed with the quality and versatility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sound. Easily replaced my wired speakers.
reviews.reviewText: Replace my existing wired speakers on the porch that were the same size, so, can't review the install except that they fit great, and worked right away using existing wire. Using the power converter that came with it for now. Want to hardwire eventually.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Epic! ! A must have ! My brownstone sounds like a colosseum! Easily installed by a license Electrician or if you are handy. You will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent sound, poor design and documentation
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is pretty good. The speakers are easy to install, and mount flush if done right. Bluetooth pairing was pretty easy. I only tried with one device, so I don't know if it works for two.Documentation is pretty sparse.I put these into a new house where I was able to put the speaker wires in during framing. I used decent sized speaker wires (14ga) that fit the speakers' large connectors. The problem is that the actual device only fits 18ga wires or smaller. The terminals even have a little metal block that prevents anything larger going in there. I had to splice my 14ga down to 18ga before it would work.Also, the terminals face forwards, so you have to bend the wires backwards in a small space, I'm not sure that was intentional.Finally, the left/right aren't marked. The positive terminals are marked (they are the outside ones), but not which is left or right. I had to cross my fingers and test after install. The documentation and the printed circuit board have no information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great system for the low price !
reviews.reviewText: Sound quality is awesome , you can crank it up to rock and the sound quality is still great with no distortion . Tool about 2.5 hrs to install in my ceiling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These are great for our covered porch. My husband is an electrician so it was easy to install. Sounds great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars extra easy simple installation
Excellent quality, working great for months
reviews.reviewText: Installed the speakers in the kitchen ceiling and the amplifier just above the counter for ease of access. We use them almost daily, and they’re working great while cooking or entertaining, good volume control and better bass than anticipated. I choose to direct wire the amp, and after being scared by the lack of consideration for electrical safety in the Herdio YouTube installation video, choose to enclose the direct wire solution inside a shielded electrical box. Now I have no ugly wires showing!
Buen sonido y fácil instalación, algo cariñosas nomas, la recomiendo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great product but not easy to connect the power lead to to back of the unit.

reviews.reviewTitle: Y me falto un cable para bocina solo venía uno de eso que son rojo con blanco
reviews.reviewText: Yo ya eh comprado más de esas tengo en mi patio y se oyen bien fregón pero tienen el transmisor o el que avienta la señal separado y este lo tiene en el aparato ese donde se le sube a el volumen y se conecta el usb no se como se llama pero no da potencia como las otras bocinas que compre 4 lo tiene en cada dos y la potencia es mucho mayor bien fregona decolvi estás y volví a pedir dos de las otras por me gusto mucho su producto solo ese detalle no pero felicidades por sus productos a la marca herido no le pide nada a ninguna otra marca

reviews.reviewTitle: Facile à installer et qualité de son impeccable
